name: Jade Chamber
description: Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to match the Elemental Type of your active character.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to match the Elemental Type of your active character.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to match the Elemental Type of your active character.
storytext: "They say that it contains a thousand dazzling jewels."
source: Reward for accepting Bu'yun's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
